meanings.definition: The act of weighing or considering carefully.
meanings.sent1: After much preponderation, he finally made up his mind.
meanings.sent2: She engaged in preponderations before making any major purchases.
meanings.sent3: The preponderations of which movie to watch led to a hilarious debate.
meanings.sent4: His preponderations on the matter were as delicate as balancing on a tightrope.
meanings.sent5: The preponderations of options in front of her were overwhelming.
